title: Personalized Country Design Horse Stall Sign with Horseshoes
features: ✅:SUPERIOR QUALITY HOME DECORATION SIGNS FOR INDOOR OR OUTDOOR: Printed on vinyl with premium quality eco-friendly ink, protective UV over laminate for stay true color, then mounted on weatherproof PVC that won't rust or rot which make them long lasting
✅ READY TO HANG: Convenient Pre-Drilled Holes – Can’t wait to get your sign on the wall? With ready-made keyholes, our signs offer quick and easy mounting
✅ PROUDLY MADE BY A VETERAN IN THE USA : Located in South Florida, we promise high-quality handcrafted signs and personalized service with all materials made in the USA
description: Turn your horse's stable into a cozy and stylish home with this stunning horse stall plaque! It has a gold-colored background and a distinctive country and western-inspired design. Your beloved horse's name appears in country-style lettering, above a star and your own name. A pair of horseshoes adorns the two bottom corners. With this custom barn sign on display, you can be a proud horse owner and your steed can be proud of his or her home! Available in four sizes: 16x5x3/8 ($34.95),18x7x1/2 ($59.95); 28x11x1/2 ($89.95) and 36x15x1/2 ($159.95).  Printed on Durable Vinyl  Mounted on 1/2'' or 3/8" (small) size)Weatherproof PVC  UV Protective Over-Laminate  Display Indoors or Outdoors  Ready to Hang - Keyholes on Back
All signs come ready to hang with keyholes on back unless you state otherwise in "Note to Seller" located in the "Select Options" section available before you add your item to cart.
Please message us if you have any questions.
If you’re looking for a one-of-a-kind sign custom designed just for you, contact us for a quote.
